services.title: Classic Lashes
services.description: Lottie will apply lash extensions to each of your own eyelashes along the upper lashline. To create a natural, wispy look, she will choose the suitable curl, length and thickness to suit your eye shape. Infills £25.

services.title: Hybrid Lashes
services.description: A combination of Classic and Volume eyelashes are applied for a full and fluffy, but defined eyelash effect. It is essentially 'the best of both lash worlds' and is also perfect for transitioning from one eyelash style to the other. Infills £30.

services.title: Volume Lashes
services.description: The latest trend in semi permanent lash extensions, if you're looking for the 'wow-factor' or something a bit more dramatic, then volume lashes are for you. Each fan is handmade, Lottie will pick up between 2-6 lashes to create a fan. 2 hours are needed for this application as perfection cannot be rushed! Infills £35.

services.title: Removal
services.description: Please ensure your lash extension removal is carried out by a professional, this treatment can take up to 15 minutes.

services.title: Lash Lift and Tint
services.description: This curling and tinting treatment is one of the quickest ways to brighten and lift your entire face.

services.title: Brow Lamination, Wax and Tint
services.description: Brow Lamination is an innovative beauty treatment, the process of reconstructing the brow hairs to keep them in the desired shape.

services.title: LBL Brow Makeover
services.description: For perfect brows that frame and lift your features. Your brows will be professionally waxed, threaded and trimmed to create a perfectly symmetrical shape, then a professional tint is applied to add extra definition to your natural brows.

services.title: Dermaplane
services.description: Dermaplane is a safe, non-invasive skin treatment that exfoliates the surface of the skin whilst removing the vellus hair (peach fuzz).

services.title: Luxury Facial (30 minutes)
services.description: A relaxing facial that includes a full cleanse, toner, exfoliation, massage (including face, neck, arms and hand), a face mask and moisturise. Add a dermaplane treatment for an extra £20.

services.title: Luxury Facial (60 minutes)
services.description: A relaxing facial that includes a full cleanse, toner, exfoliation, massage (including face, neck, arms and hand), a face mask and moisturise. Add a dermaplane treatment for an extra £20.
